description:
Full screen on the TouchPad.

Feature List:
-Bibles in multiple translations in English, German and Spanish for you to download for FREE.
-OFFLINE READING - Once The Bible is downloaded to your phone, you may use it without a data connection.  
-Search
-Portrait or landscape reading(phones only)
-Multiple bookmarks
-Random verse selector 
-Day/night contrast choices.

If you have any problems, please read the help section or send an email to: help@bitsofgodsoftware.com.  We can resolve most problems via email.  Please don’t leave a support question in the reviews because we have no way of replying to them.
versionNote: German and Spanish UI was broken last update because I had changed an HTML file.  It is now fixed.
